ProductInfo.Features:
4th Gen Intel® CoreTM i5-4200U mobile processor,  1.6GHz (with Turbo Boost up to 2.6GHz); Windows 8.1  64-bit
15.6" Full HD touch screen for hands-on control:Touch, tap, glide and make the most of Windows 8. 1920 x 1080 resolution boasts impressive color and clarity. HP BrightView glossy screen maintains the vivid colors in your images. LED backlight.
8GB system memory , 750GB hard drive, Intel® HD Graphics 4400,  NO optical drive(CD/DVD)
Next-Gen Intel® Wireless-AC, BlueTooth, HDMi, Intel Wireless Display (WiDi)
Backlit Keyboard, 2 USB 3.0, 1 USB 2.0,Weighs 5.6 lbs. and measures 0.9" thin, Aluminum finish in modern silver
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY m6 TouchSmart Sleekbook 15.6" Touch-Screen 1920x1080 Laptop: i5-4200U, 8GB Memory, 750GB Hard Drive,Backlit Keyboard, 0.9" thin, Widi, Bluetooth, USB 3.0/2.0, Win 8.1, Modern Silver
